page.title: 08FAVOURITE CHILDRENS GAMES.
page.content: Knives, forks, spoons and spears is a game where somebody is "on". They say "knives, forks, spoons and spears" then when they say "spears" everybody that is playing goes up into a handstand. The last person who comes down is "on". If two people come down at the same time the person says it again.The two people do a hand stand and the last person to come down is "on". Dr. Dr. is a game which you can play anywhere. Everybody can join in.Everybody who joins in gets in a circle holding hands. One person goes away so that he can't see the circle of people. Then the circle of people go under and over their arms and get in a tangle, then the circle of people call Dr.Dr. and the person who has gone off comes back. He tries to get the circle back to normal.
